snippet: After dropping seven of Peyton Manning's passes against Pittsburgh, the Denver Broncos wide receivers found themselves running the "gauntlet" drill this week....
lead_paragraph: After dropping seven of Peyton Manning's passes against Pittsburgh, the Denver Broncos wide receivers found themselves running the "gauntlet" drill this week.

headline.main: Broncos Would Love to Run While Brady Stays on Sideline
headline.print_headline: Broncos Would Love to Run While Brady Stays on Sideline
